Description.Chinese: 使建筑覆盖范围在街道更好地可见，更容易区分完全覆盖和不完全覆盖，可在蓝图模式下使用。
Description.English: Makes the street overlays for building ranges better visible, to distinguish between full and not full satisfaction more easily, also in blueprintmode. Idea and part of mod taken from Callesen58.
Description.French: Makes the street overlays for building ranges better visible, to distinguish between full and not full satisfaction more easily, also in blueprintmode. Idea and part of mod taken from Callesen58.
Description.German: Macht die Straßen-Überschattung von Gebäuden better sichtbar, um leichter zwischen voller und nicht voller Erfüllung zu unterscheiden, auch im Blaupausenmodus. Idee und Teile vom Code von Callesen58.
